greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First column of inverse of Delannoy triangle.
comment: First column of A103136. The positive sequence has g.f. 1+xS(x). It is the first column of the inverse of the signed Delannoy triangle which has general term T(n,k)=if(k<=n, sum{j=0..k, 2^j*C(n-k,j)C(k,j)}(-1)^(n-k),0).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: G.f.: 1-xS(-x), where S(x) is the g.f. of the large Schroeder numbers A006318.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jan 24 2005
